item.title: go grpc
item.description: python å®ç° cat Server.py from SimpleXMLRPCServer import SimpleXMLRPCServer def fun_add(a,b): total = a+b return total if __name__=='__main__': s = SimpleXMLRPCServer(('0.0.0.0',8081)) s.register_function(fun_add) print "server in on line" s.serve_forever() cat Client.py from xmlrpclib import ServerProxy s = ServerProxy("http://xx.xxx.xxx.xxx:8081") print s.fun_add(1,2) go å®ç°
